page.title: 04HEALTH & COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: HEALTH There is a purpose built surgery dating from 1976. The doctor is one of 4 partners. The other 3 practise in Wick, Pucklechurch and Colerne respectively. It is a rural dispensing practice. The part time nursing staff comprise health visitor, midwife and district nurses. The part time ancillary staff comprise receptionist and 2 secretaries. The practice covers general health care, and patients are referred to Bath/Bristol for consultant opinion. Social Services are covered by Avon. Meals on Wheels are distributed by volunteers twice a week to some of the elderly people. COMMUNICATIONS Outgoing mail is sorted at Swindon and incoming at Chippenham. A new village telephone exchange means all numbers are prefixed by a Bath code.
